segment.source: How to Install MBAM with Configuration Manager
segment.target: How to Install MBAM with Configuration Manager

segment.source: How to Install MBAM with Configuration Manager
segment.target: How to Install MBAM with Configuration Manager

segment.source: How to Install MBAM with Configuration Manager
segment.target: How to Install MBAM with Configuration Manager

segment.source: This section describes the steps to install MBAM with Configuration Manager by using the recommended configuration, which is illustrated in Getting Started - Using MBAM with Configuration Manager.
segment.target: This section describes the steps to install MBAM with Configuration Manager by using the recommended configuration, which is illustrated in Getting Started - Using MBAM with Configuration Manager.

segment.source: The steps are divided into the following tasks:
segment.target: The steps are divided into the following tasks:

segment.source: Install and configure MBAM on the Configuration Manager Server
segment.target: Install and configure MBAM on the Configuration Manager Server

segment.source: Install the Recovery and Audit Databases on the Database Server
segment.target: Install the Recovery and Audit Databases on the Database Server

segment.source: Install the Administration and Monitoring Server features on the Administration and Monitoring Server
segment.target: Install the Administration and Monitoring Server features on the Administration and Monitoring Server

segment.source: Before you begin the installation, ensure that you have edited or created the necessary mof files.
segment.target: Before you begin the installation, ensure that you have edited or created the necessary mof files.

segment.source: For instructions, see How to Create or Edit the mof Files.
segment.target: For instructions, see How to Create or Edit the mof Files.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: If you are using a non-default SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) instance, you must start the MBAM Setup by using the following command line to specify the SSRS named instance:
segment.target: If you are using a non-default SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) instance, you must start the MBAM Setup by using the following command line to specify the SSRS named instance:

segment.source: To install MBAM on the Configuration Manager Server
segment.target: To install MBAM on the Configuration Manager Server

segment.source: On the Configuration Manager Server, run MBAMSetup.exe to start the MBAM installation wizard.
segment.target: On the Configuration Manager Server, run MBAMSetup.exe to start the MBAM installation wizard.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: To obtain the setup log files, you have to use the Msiexec package and the /Llocation option to install Configuration Manager.
segment.target: To obtain the setup log files, you have to use the Msiexec package and the /Llocation option to install Configuration Manager.

segment.source: Log files are created in the location that you specify.
segment.target: Log files are created in the location that you specify.

segment.source: Additional setup log files are created in the %temp% folder on the computer of the user who is installing Configuration Manager.
segment.target: Additional setup log files are created in the %temp% folder on the computer of the user who is installing Configuration Manager.

segment.source: On the Welcome page, optionally select the Customer Experience Improvement Program, and then click Start.
segment.target: On the Welcome page, optionally select the Customer Experience Improvement Program, and then click Start.

segment.source: Read and accept the Microsoft Software License Agreement, and then click Next to continue the installation.
segment.target: Read and accept the Microsoft Software License Agreement, and then click Next to continue the installation.

segment.source: On the Topology Selection page, select System Center Configuration Manager Integration, and then click Next.
segment.target: On the Topology Selection page, select System Center Configuration Manager Integration, and then click Next.

segment.source: On the Select features to install page, select System Center Configuration Manager Integration.
segment.target: On the Select features to install page, select System Center Configuration Manager Integration.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: On the Checking Prerequisites page, click Next after the installation wizard checks the prerequisites for your installation and confirms that none are missing.
segment.target: On the Checking Prerequisites page, click Next after the installation wizard checks the prerequisites for your installation and confirms that none are missing.

segment.source: If a missing prerequisite is detected, you have to resolve the missing prerequisites, and then click Check prerequisites again.
segment.target: If a missing prerequisite is detected, you have to resolve the missing prerequisites, and then click Check prerequisites again.

segment.source: Specify whether to use Microsoft Updates to help keep your computer secure, and then click Next.
segment.target: Specify whether to use Microsoft Updates to help keep your computer secure, and then click Next.

segment.source: Using Microsoft Updates does not turn on Automatic Updates in Windows.
segment.target: Using Microsoft Updates does not turn on Automatic Updates in Windows.

segment.source: Click Next to continue.
segment.target: Click Next to continue.

segment.source: On the Installation Summary page, review the list of features that will be installed, and click Install to start installing the MBAM features.
segment.target: On the Installation Summary page, review the list of features that will be installed, and click Install to start installing the MBAM features.

segment.source: Click Back to move back through the wizard if you have to review or change your installation settings, or click Cancel to exit Setup.
segment.target: Click Back to move back through the wizard if you have to review or change your installation settings, or click Cancel to exit Setup.

segment.source: Setup installs the MBAM features and notifies you that the installation is completed.
segment.target: Setup installs the MBAM features and notifies you that the installation is completed.

segment.source: Click Finish to exit the wizard.
segment.target: Click Finish to exit the wizard.

segment.source: To install the Recovery and Audit Databases on the Database Server
segment.target: To install the Recovery and Audit Databases on the Database Server

segment.source: On the Database Server, run MBAMSetup.exe to start the MBAM installation wizard.
segment.target: On the Database Server, run MBAMSetup.exe to start the MBAM installation wizard.

segment.source: On the Welcome page, optionally select the Customer Experience Improvement Program, and then click Start.
segment.target: On the Welcome page, optionally select the Customer Experience Improvement Program, and then click Start.

segment.source: Read and accept the Microsoft Software License Agreement, and then click Next to continue the installation.
segment.target: Read and accept the Microsoft Software License Agreement, and then click Next to continue the installation.

segment.source: On the Topology Selection page, select the System Center Configuration Manager Integration topology, and then click Next.
segment.target: On the Topology Selection page, select the System Center Configuration Manager Integration topology, and then click Next.

segment.source: From the list of features to install, select Recovery Database and Audit Database, and clear the remaining features.
segment.target: From the list of features to install, select Recovery Database and Audit Database, and clear the remaining features.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The installation wizard checks the prerequisites for your installation and displays the prerequisites that are missing.
segment.target: The installation wizard checks the prerequisites for your installation and displays the prerequisites that are missing.

segment.source: If all of the prerequisites are met, the installation continues.
segment.target: If all of the prerequisites are met, the installation continues.

segment.source: If a missing prerequisite is detected, you have to resolve the missing prerequisites, and then click Check prerequisites again.
segment.target: If a missing prerequisite is detected, you have to resolve the missing prerequisites, and then click Check prerequisites again.

segment.source: If all prerequisites are met this time, the installation resumes.
segment.target: If all prerequisites are met this time, the installation resumes.

segment.source: On the Configure the Recovery Database page, specify the names of the computers that will be running the Administration and Monitoring Server feature.
segment.target: On the Configure the Recovery Database page, specify the names of the computers that will be running the Administration and Monitoring Server feature.

segment.source: After the Administration and Monitoring Server feature is deployed, it uses its domain account to connect to the database.
segment.target: After the Administration and Monitoring Server feature is deployed, it uses its domain account to connect to the database.

segment.source: Click Next to continue.
segment.target: Click Next to continue.

segment.source: Specify the SQL Server instance name and the name of the database that will store the recovery data.
segment.target: Specify the SQL Server instance name and the name of the database that will store the recovery data.

segment.source: You must also specify both where the database will be located and where the log information will be located.
segment.target: You must also specify both where the database will be located and where the log information will be located.

segment.source: Click Next to continue with the MBAM Setup installation wizard.
segment.target: Click Next to continue with the MBAM Setup installation wizard.

segment.source: On the Configure the Audit Database page, specify the user account that will be used to access the database for reports.
segment.target: On the Configure the Audit Database page, specify the user account that will be used to access the database for reports.

segment.source: Specify the computer names of the computers that will be running the Administration and Monitoring Server and the Audit Reports.
segment.target: Specify the computer names of the computers that will be running the Administration and Monitoring Server and the Audit Reports.

segment.source: After the Administration and Monitoring and the Audit Reports features are deployed, their domain accounts will be used to connect to the databases.
segment.target: After the Administration and Monitoring and the Audit Reports features are deployed, their domain accounts will be used to connect to the databases.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If you are installing the Audit Database without the Audit Reports feature, you must add an exception on the Audit Database computer to enable inbound traffic on the Microsoft SQL Server port.
segment.target: If you are installing the Audit Database without the Audit Reports feature, you must add an exception on the Audit Database computer to enable inbound traffic on the Microsoft SQL Server port.

segment.source: The default port number is 1433.
segment.target: The default port number is 1433.

segment.source: Specify the SQL Server instance name and the name of the database that will store the audit data.
segment.target: Specify the SQL Server instance name and the name of the database that will store the audit data.

segment.source: You must also specify where the database and log information will be located.
segment.target: You must also specify where the database and log information will be located.

segment.source: Click Install to start the installation, and then click Finish to complete the installation.
segment.target: Click Install to start the installation, and then click Finish to complete the installation.

segment.source: To install the Administration and Monitoring Server features on the Administration and Monitoring Server
segment.target: To install the Administration and Monitoring Server features on the Administration and Monitoring Server

segment.source: On the Administration and Monitoring Server, run MBAMSetup.exe to start the MBAM installation wizard.
segment.target: On the Administration and Monitoring Server, run MBAMSetup.exe to start the MBAM installation wizard.

segment.source: On the Welcome page, optionally select the Customer Experience Improvement Program, and then click Start.
segment.target: On the Welcome page, optionally select the Customer Experience Improvement Program, and then click Start.

segment.source: Read and accept the Microsoft Software License Agreement, and then click Next to continue the installation.
segment.target: Read and accept the Microsoft Software License Agreement, and then click Next to continue the installation.

segment.source: On the Topology Selection page, select the System Center Configuration Manager Integration topology, and then click Next.
segment.target: On the Topology Selection page, select the System Center Configuration Manager Integration topology, and then click Next.

segment.source: From the list of features to install, select Administration and Monitoring Server and Self-Service Portal, and clear the remaining features.
segment.target: From the list of features to install, select Administration and Monitoring Server and Self-Service Portal, and clear the remaining features.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The installation wizard checks the prerequisites for your installation and displays the prerequisites that are missing.
segment.target: The installation wizard checks the prerequisites for your installation and displays the prerequisites that are missing.

segment.source: If all of the prerequisites are met, the installation continues.
segment.target: If all of the prerequisites are met, the installation continues.

segment.source: If a missing prerequisite is detected, you have to resolve the missing prerequisites, and then click Check prerequisites again.
segment.target: If a missing prerequisite is detected, you have to resolve the missing prerequisites, and then click Check prerequisites again.

segment.source: If all prerequisites are met this time, the installation resumes.
segment.target: If all prerequisites are met this time, the installation resumes.

segment.source: Install the Self-Service Portal by following the steps in the To install the Self-Service Portal section in How to Install and Configure MBAM on Distributed Servers.
segment.target: Install the Self-Service Portal by following the steps in the To install the Self-Service Portal section in How to Install and Configure MBAM on Distributed Servers.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If the client computers will not have access to the Microsoft Content Delivery Network (CDN), which gives the Self-Service Portal the required access to certain JavaScript files, complete the steps in the To configure the Self-Service Portal when end users cannot access the Microsoft Content Delivery Network section How to Install and Configure MBAM on Distributed Servers to configure the Self-Service Portal to reference the JavaScript files from an accessible source.
segment.target: If the client computers will not have access to the Microsoft Content Delivery Network (CDN), which gives the Self-Service Portal the required access to certain JavaScript files, complete the steps in the To configure the Self-Service Portal when end users cannot access the Microsoft Content Delivery Network section How to Install and Configure MBAM on Distributed Servers to configure the Self-Service Portal to reference the JavaScript files from an accessible source.

segment.source: Install the Administration and Monitoring Server features by following the steps in the To install the Administration and Monitoring Server feature section in How to Install and Configure MBAM on Distributed Servers.
segment.target: Install the Administration and Monitoring Server features by following the steps in the To install the Administration and Monitoring Server feature section in How to Install and Configure MBAM on Distributed Servers.

segment.source: Click Finish to complete the installation.
segment.target: Click Finish to complete the installation.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: How to Validate the MBAM Installation with Configuration Manager
segment.target: How to Validate the MBAM Installation with Configuration Manager

segment.source: Deploying MBAM with Configuration Manager
segment.target: Deploying MBAM with Configuration Manager
